${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Initiate.NAME: Initiate
${modID}:Initiate.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard 1 card at random. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Quench.NAME: Quench
${modID}:Quench.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Umbra. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay: Obtain a random potion and Exhaust.

${modID}:Sightread.NAME: Sightread
${modID}:Sightread.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy's health equals or exceeds yours, gain !M! Dexterity. NL Otherwise, gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Fracture.NAME: Fracture
${modID}:Fracture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL For each unblocked hit, the enemy loses 1 Strength this turn.

${modID}:Extinction.NAME: Extinction
${modID}:Extinction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, ALL future instances of this enemy will die upon spawning. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Pocket.NAME: Pocket
${modID}:Pocket.DESCRIPTION: Put a ${modID}:Shadow card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Pocket.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put a ${modID}:Shadow card from your draw pile into your hand.

${modID}:SubconsciousKiller.NAME: Subconscious Killer
${modID}:SubconsciousKiller.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay: Gain !M! Strength and 5 Vigor.

${modID}:Injection.NAME: Injection
${modID}:Injection.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay: Play this card at full effect.

${modID}:GiftFromBelow.NAME: Gift From Below
${modID}:GiftFromBelow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Virulence. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:VanishingAct.NAME: Vanishing Act
${modID}:VanishingAct.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay: Retain your hand this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Admire.NAME: Admire
${modID}:Admire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy blocks this hit, gain !M! *Plated *Armor and draw a card.

${modID}:Eclipse.NAME: Eclipse
${modID}:Eclipse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Poison twice. NL Deal !D! damage twice.

${modID}:Shroud.NAME: Shroud
${modID}:Shroud.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:SufferWithMe.NAME: Suffer With Me
${modID}:SufferWithMe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Poison. NL Apply 6 Poison to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Discretion.NAME: Discretion
${modID}:Discretion.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Humiliate.NAME: Humiliate
${modID}:Humiliate.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Gain Strength equal to the number of enemies affected by this. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:OnlyADream.NAME: Only A Dream
${modID}:OnlyADream.DESCRIPTION: Choose a common or basic card in your hand. NL Exhaust it, then play a copy of it each turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Slipup.NAME: Slipup
${modID}:Slipup.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay: Shuffle a Void into your draw pile.

${modID}:Imprudence.NAME: Imprudence
${modID}:Imprudence.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. NL Draw up to !M! ${modID}:Shadow cards. NL Add 1 *Slipup to your hand.

${modID}:WaxingFlask.NAME: Waxing Flask
${modID}:WaxingFlask.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block twice. NL Apply !M! Poison twice.

${modID}:Bulwark.NAME: Bulwark
${modID}:Bulwark.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy in combat.

${modID}:FinishTheJob.NAME: Finish The Job
${modID}:FinishTheJob.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Umbra. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay: Exhaust your hand.

${modID}:LightsOut.NAME: Lights Out
${modID}:LightsOut.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay: Shadowplay ALL ${modID}:Shadow cards in hand.
${modID}:LightsOut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Umbra. NL Unplayable. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay: Shadowplay ALL ${modID}:Shadow cards in hand.

${modID}:Desperation.NAME: Desperation
${modID}:Desperation.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL If you have Poison, gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Desperation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain [E]. NL If you have Poison, gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Release.NAME: Release
${modID}:Release.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Poison, then transfer your Poison to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Disengage.NAME: Disengage
${modID}:Disengage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Repeat for each ${modID}:Penumbra card in your hand.
${modID}:Disengage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Repeat for each ${modID}:Umbra or ${modID}:Penumbra card in your hand.

${modID}:GrowingPains.NAME: Growing Pains
${modID}:GrowingPains.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL When drawn, draw !M! cards and gain 1 Poison.

${modID}:EscapeArtist.NAME: Escape Artist
${modID}:EscapeArtist.DESCRIPTION: You cannot play Attacks for !M! turns. NL When this wears off, gain 8 Strength and [E] [E] . NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Expurgate.NAME: Expurgate
${modID}:Expurgate.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if there are no cards in your draw pile. NL Deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have cards in my draw pile!

${modID}:ShadowStrike.NAME: Shadow Strike
${modID}:ShadowStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay: Apply !M! Weak to a random enemy.

${modID}:CrescentBlade.NAME: Crescent Blade
${modID}:CrescentBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each card ${modID}:Shadowplayed this combat.

${modID}:UnknownDepths.NAME: Unknown Depths
${modID}:UnknownDepths.DESCRIPTION: Add a random ${modID}:Shadow card into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Arsenal.NAME: Arsenal
${modID}:Arsenal.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL For each ${modID}:Shadow card drawn, discard a card.

${modID}:ChainedHits.NAME: Chained Hits
${modID}:ChainedHits.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Increase the number of hits by 1 this combat.

${modID}:Grasp.NAME: Grasp
${modID}:Grasp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have Poison, apply !M! Poison.

${modID}:NecroticJab.NAME: Necrotic Jab
${modID}:NecroticJab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Enemy gains !M! Poison whenever you gain Poison.

${modID}:NothingPersonal.NAME: Nothing Personal
${modID}:NothingPersonal.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Penumbra. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:Perturb.NAME: Perturb
${modID}:Perturb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ALL other enemies gain !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:TunnelVision.NAME: Tunnel Vision
${modID}:TunnelVision.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Discard non-adjacent cards.

${modID}:OlReliable.NAME: Ol' Reliable
${modID}:OlReliable.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if there is an adjacent ${modID}:Shadow card. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: There are no adjacent Shadow cards!

${modID}:Seethe.NAME: Seethe
${modID}:Seethe.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay: Gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:Seep.NAME: Seep
${modID}:Seep.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each stack of Poison you have.

${modID}:QuickKick.NAME: Quick Kick
${modID}:QuickKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has less HP than you, *Stun them and gain !M! ${modID}:Outburst.

${modID}:Breach.NAME: Breach
${modID}:Breach.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Penumbra. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay: Gain !B! Block.

${modID}:Incognito.NAME: Incognito
${modID}:Incognito.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if every other card in your hand is a ${modID}:Shadow card. NL Deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have non-Shadow cards in my hand!

${modID}:CleanKill.NAME: Clean Kill
${modID}:CleanKill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If EXACTLY Fatal, permanently start each combat with 1 more Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Cobra.NAME: Cobra
${modID}:Cobra.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Poison equal to the number of cards ${modID}:Shadowplayed this combat.

${modID}:Harvest.NAME: Harvest
${modID}:Harvest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:SkeletalFinger.NAME: Skeletal Finger
${modID}:SkeletalFinger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put !M! random ${modID}:Shadow card from your discard pile into your hand.
${modID}:SkeletalFinger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put !M! random ${modID}:Shadow cards from your discard pile into your hand.

${modID}:Skulker.NAME: Skulker
${modID}:Skulker.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Penumbra. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay: Add a Miracle into your hand.
${modID}:Skulker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Penumbra. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay: Add a Miracle+ into your hand.

${modID}:Livelihood.NAME: Livelihood
${modID}:Livelihood.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is ${modID}:Shadowplayed, Upgrade a random card in your hand.

${modID}:Nightlight.NAME: Nightlight
${modID}:Nightlight.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Umbra. NL Gain 2 Temporary Dexterity. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:BlackFlowers.NAME: Black Flowers
${modID}:BlackFlowers.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies X times. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Opening.NAME: Opening
${modID}:Opening.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if no enemies intend to Attack, gain !M! Strength and 6 Vigor.

${modID}:RiskyBusiness.NAME: Risky Business
${modID}:RiskyBusiness.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Poison, draw a card.

${modID}:Veil.NAME: Veil
${modID}:Veil.DESCRIPTION: The first ${modID}:Shadowplay effect triggered each turn gets triggered an additional time.

${modID}:AssassinForm.NAME: Assassin Form
${modID}:AssassinForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, trigger the ${modID}:Shadowplay effect of all ${modID}:Shadowplay cards in your hand.

${modID}:Dominate.NAME: Dominate
${modID}:Dominate.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply Poison, apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable.

${modID}:Trade.NAME: The Pact
${modID}:Trade.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is ${modID}:Shadowplayed, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Refinement.NAME: Refinement
${modID}:Refinement.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! ${modID}:Virulence.

${modID}:ShadowDefend.NAME: Shadow Defend
${modID}:ShadowDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay: Apply !M! Vulnerable to a random enemy.

${modID}:ConcealedBlade.NAME: Concealed Blade
${modID}:ConcealedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Shadowplay: Draw an additional card next turn.

${modID}:CrookedMile.NAME: Crooked Mile
${modID}:CrookedMile.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until your hand is full. NL Increase the cost of ALL cards in hand by 1 this combat.
